text:
TrueVault (YC W14) | San Francisco, CA | FT, Remote | Staff/Principal Engineers | $160K - $185K + equity (.25% - .5%) + benefits | www.truevault.com TrueVault is the first data security company entirely focused on protecting Personal Data companies collect. TrueVault delivers brutally tough data security and seamless portability that empowers organizations and developers to build meaningful applications for its consumers. We're eliminating the false choice between data security and data accessibility. We are looking for solid hackers to join our engineering team.

TrueVault was 100% remote for several years. Now we continue to have a fully distributed engineering team but also has an office in SF office for non-engineering roles.

To apply: https://stackoverflow.com/jobs/companies/truevault
